A natural

you and biohazards.

Occiban is a high-end disinfectant coating that uses nano-technology to continuously protect any surface from virusses, bacteria and other known pathogens.



Occiban is a high-end disinfectant coating that uses nano-technology to continuously protect any surface from virusses, bacteria and other known pathogens.

A natural disinfectant free from alcohol and chemical components. It has no colour, is odourless and won’t degrade or discolor surfaces.

Proven to be 99,99% effective to kill SARS-CoV-2 and other pathogens within one minute on any surface. It will ensure a safe and clean environ- ment for you and surroundings.

Protects surfaces and skin up to 5000x longer than traditional disinfectants. Traditional disinfectants need to be reapplied continuously while Occiban doesn’t lose its effectiveness. This saves time, money and reduces your environmental footprint.

Occiban’s Nano Technology

The antimicrobial effect occurs when the solution dries and mechanically attaches, leaving behind a 4nm silica dioxide barrier.


This barrier is a micro – crystalline structure that will destroy the cell walls of the biohazard attempting to multiply on the treated surface.


The process above is called a ‘mechanical kill’, whereas for years science has tried combatting biohazards with ‘chemical kills’, utilizing toxic combinations of chemicals (cfr. traditional disinfectant).

Our technology has been trusted and used by hospitals and operating rooms for over fifteen years as well as been tested vigorously and approved for multiple certificates and approvals.


Click here to download the study performed by Liverpool University.
